name: Dungeons & Vampires
description: Dungeons & Vampires- addictive step-by-step role-playing role-playing Roguelike-game with a gothic atmosphere, combining Dungeon Crawler and Clicker mechanics. Teach your hunters to vampires, clearing the way through dangerous procedurally-generated dungeons.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP SP3 Processor: Intel Atom 1.2 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: any
recommended_requirements: OS: 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel I3 or better Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Better then Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: any
